description:
Has anyone ever told you not to get overwhelmed?  Probably.  So, how does knowing that you shouldn’t be overwhelmed teach you how not to be overwhelmed?

When we inventoried all the breakthroughs we had, we realized that we needed to put this information together and get it out there so we could help as many people as possible.

We first considered including this as another offering in our consulting practice, but there were two challenges.  One is based on our rate structure–most entrepreneurs would not be able to afford our rates.  The second was by doing one-on-one coaching, we would be severely limited on how many people we could touch.  So, we considered delivering this content via live seminars.   Again, we saw the challenge of limited time and resources.

The question remained: how could we offer a program that ANYONE could access and apply within 24 hours?  This question led to the launch of our new online video program called Time Mastery Excellence.  We filmed this program in front of a live group that paid thousands of dollars to attend.

Our Time Mastery video/mp3 program is beyond the typical Time Management program.  We get right to the point in the beginning of the program–who you are is just as important as what you are doing.  Controlling your emotions and state is one of the most powerful ways to be productive.  Imagine what it would be like to be composed in chaos.  See yourself having the ability to eliminate feeling overwhelmed ever again!
title: Time Mastery
